Our first ever online video course is out now on SKILLSHARE!

Are you looking for your next big break? Whether you’ve NEVER had a big break in your creative career OR you’re a veteran creative who needs a new big break to reinvent yourself: this class is for you!!! Go to https://www.skillshare.com/r/profile/Andy-J.-Pizza/2832678 to get started!!!

 

PATREON + YOU!
This episode is sponsored by YOU! Well, if you’re a patron of our podcast! This show is listener supported and that means we need your help! We are on a mission to reach 500 Patreon Backers for this podcast!! Go to patreon.com/CreativePepTalk to back our show now!

itunes:title: 275 - How Seeing Personal Brand as Self Actualization Changes Everything with Michelle Poler
itunes:author: Yoni Wolf, Alex Sugg, Michelle Poler, Andy J. Pizza, Jordan Aaron
itunes:summary:
If you’re like me you have a standoffish relationship to the term “personal brand”. BUT what if this apathy is causing you to miss an incredible personal and professional opportunity?

Today on the show we have brand author and public speaker Michelle Poler! Michelle’s book “Hello Fears” JUST CAME OUT!! I wanted to have Michelle on the show to talk about this inspiring new book on facing your fears, and we did that, BUT I had no clue that we would have such an exciting and interesting discussion on how powerful and meaningful finding your personal brand can be!!!

This conversation was SO GOOD. Michelle is a creative career powerhouse and she has taught me so much in the past few years! CAN’T WAIT FOR YOU TO LISTEN!

We talk about:
Why your comfort zone may have you content, but getting out of it will make your life deeply meaningful
Personal Brand as Finding Yourself
Contrasting not Comparing Yourself with Others
Finding and Defining Your Core Values
MORE MORE MORE

Michelle’s new book is amazing and beautiful!!! This book is about a 100 day project where Michelle faced a new fear everyday for 100 days!! It went crazy viral and now she travels the world telling people how it changed her life! The book is a super action oriented and personal account that will help you face your fears too! GET YOURS NOW! https://bookshop.org/books/hello-fears-crush-your-comfort-zone-and-become-who-you-re-meant-to-be/9781492688891
